response.overview: 16-year old Rhiannon falls in love with a mysterious spirit named “A” that inhabits a different body every day. Feeling an unmatched connection, Rhiannon and “A” work each day to find each other, not knowing what the next day will bring.
response.tagline: Every day a different body. Every day a different life. Every day in love with the same girl.
response.title: Every Day
